fragments.msn: In the end, everything has ended the same, can't say I haven't tried.
I suppose it's too late now, you have wasted the opportunity I've given you.
Álex and Ana will continue to make life impossible to the other classmates. You haven't been their first victim, nor the last.
Is it too hard asking for help when one needs it? Forget our ego. One is not to blame for what happens to him nor deserves it.
Why that fear of sharing what is going on with yourself? What one feels?
Why do we let people suffer? Why do we think it's best to remain quiet, to let time heal everything?
It's easy to laugh at others, but what happens when they laugh at you.
Why is it best to suffer or see other suffer than ask for help? Is it asking for help sneak up? Is sneaking up avoiding someone to have a rough time?
It appears I haven't made my purpose at the end, but at least I improved things a little.
Álex will be watched and will at least leave you all be at peace.
You must ask for help when you need. Forget our ego.  One is not to blame for what happens to him nor deserves it.
Time is not gonna fix things if you suffer, you must not let it go.
We all need help once in a while and I hope now you are aware that as there are people who help you, others need you to help them.
Maybe it's best to suffer or see other suffer than ask for help, Is it asking for help sneak up? Is sneaking up avoiding someone to have a rough time?
I hope that, having passed what you have gone through, you lose that fear of telling what bad thing happens to you and your classmates.
Good, we've managed to change things.
You don't know yet, but we've managed Álex to stop bullying you and your classmates.
If no one had stopped him, you wouldn't have been the last person to suffer his bullying.
Es bueno contar las cosas, pedir ayuda. Nadie se merece que lo marginen, humillen o se burlen de él, sea cual sea el motivo.
There will be people saying you sneak up to your professor, to your classmates or to your parents. I think you've been a hero.
I hope you never keep quiet again if someone needs help or is suffering. That you show them your support instead of following the bully.
It's easy to do nothing, but you've learned that you can be his next victim as it's happened now.

options.msn: Cut the crap and go away.

fragments.msn: I'm afraid a can't tell you that.
Think of me as someone who is conected to you by all the things we have in common.
Maybe... a voice of conscience.
But it doesn't matter who I am. What matters is that what you've lived made you think and be a better person.
I'm sorry my presence doesn't make you comfortable.
And that maybe this was for nothing...
